subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Didier Drogba scored in the 84th minute as Chelsea defeated Arsenal, 2-1, in an all-London semifinal in the English Football Association Cup at Wembley Stadium.
snippet: Didier Drogba scored in the 84th minute as Chelsea defeated Arsenal, 2-1, in an all-London semifinal in the English Football Association Cup at Wembley Stadium.
